评论概述: Immediately returned.  Bad quality even for the price.  Tin Foil.
评论详情: Immediately stuck this back into the package for return. I had high hopes for this ring, hoping to save my boyfriend some money when he proposes to me, but I will not be happy wearing this ring.  Does not look anything like pictured.  The ring is very lightweight, does not feel heavy on my finger. Claims to be real gold, but the look and feel of it is like tin foil. There is no shine on the band like real gold. I was hoping that the extra details in this ring would add to the quality (small stones), but in fact it is the opposite.  The details on it just make the ring look more "fake". I don't even have a problem with the stone, if the metal looked authentic and had some weight to it,  I would very happy wearing this ring. 2 stars - 1 star for fast shipping, and 1 star for the ability to return it, which I do appreciate.

So far so good very beautiful ring I will do and update once it has been wore for a while so far five stars based on craftsman ship updated: the ring is still wonderful she wears it everyday no problems still looks as pretty as the day it was bought
This ring is amazing! Looks just like the picture and is well built. Very sturdy.
The quality is great plan to buy the diamond when I’m back on my feet
